sentence.Network_en: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

sentence.Network_en: He accused me of making a great fuss about trivialities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他指责我为丁点琐事大惊小怪。

sentence.Network_en: Those customers who have kicked up a fuss have received refunds.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些大吵大闹的顾客得到了退款。

jx.jx_en_mean: treat (a person or animal) with excessive attention or affection

entry.tran: 紧张不安;大惊小怪;忙乱
entry.def: Fuss is anxious or excited behaviour which serves no useful purpose.

example.ex: I don't know what all the fuss is about...
example.tran: 我不知道为什么要这样大惊小怪的。

example.ex: He just gets down to work without any fuss.
example.tran: 他刚刚静下心来开始工作。

entry.tran: 紧张不安;大惊小怪;瞎忙活
entry.def: If you fuss, you worry or behave in a nervous, anxious way about unimportant matters or rush around doing unnecessary things.

example.ex: Carol fussed about getting me a drink...
example.tran: 卡萝尔手忙脚乱地要给我弄一杯喝的。

example.ex: My wife was fussing over the food and clothing we were going to take...
example.tran: 我太太正在忙乱地准备我们要带的食物和衣服。

entry.def: If you fuss over someone, you pay them a lot of attention and do things to make them happy or comfortable.

example.ex: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
example.tran: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

entry.tran: 引起骚动;大吵大闹;大发牢骚
entry.def: If you make a fuss or kick up a fuss about something, you become angry or excited about it and complain.

example.ex: I don't know why everybody makes such a fuss about a few mosquitoes...
example.tran: 我不知道为什么大家对几只蚊子大惊小怪的。

example.ex: I kick up a fuss if my wife wants to spend time alone.
example.tran: 如果妻子想要单独呆一会儿我就会大发牢骚。

entry.tran: 对…关爱备至;对…过分体贴
entry.def: If you make a fuss of someone, you pay them a lot of attention and do things to make them happy or comfortable.

example.ex: When I arrived my nephews made a big fuss of me.
example.tran: 我到达的时候，侄子们围着我嘘寒问暖。

sentences.sentence: "there was a terrible flap about the theft"
"he didn't want to make a fuss"
"don't fuss too much over the grandchildren--they are quite big now"

list.explanation: 挑起事端，引起骚动，大吵大闹，大声抱怨

example.en: I don't want his lawyer to kick up a fuss about this.
example.zh: 我不想让他的律帅对此大动干戈。

auth_sentence.content: Liverpool though says it's a fuss about nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Liverpool though says it's a fuss about nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Liverpool though says it's a fuss about nothing.

auth_sentence.content: Look at the fuss over gay marriage this week.
auth_sentence.res_content: Look at the fuss over gay marriage this week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Look at the fuss over gay marriage this week.

auth_sentence.content: They say he simply wants to make a fuss.
auth_sentence.res_content: They say he simply wants to make a fuss.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They say he simply wants to make a fuss.

Sentence.sentence: The woman shouldn't make such a big fuss.
There is no need for the man to make such a fuss
The man is making a fuss about nothing.
People are making too big a fuss about something of small impact.
The woman is making too big a fuss about her condition.

means.word_mean: 小题大做; 大惊小怪；大吵大闹
烦恼, 激动(尤指对小事)

sentences.en: I wish you would stop fussing me about; I'm quite able to look after myself.
sentences.cn: 但愿你不要为我过于操心了, 我挺能照顾我自己的。

means.word_mean: 忙乱, 大惊小怪, 小题大做

sentences.en: Stop all this fuss and do your homework.
sentences.cn: 别大惊小怪了, 去做你的家庭作业吧。

sentences.en: The old lady soon got into a fuss.
sentences.cn: 老妇人很快就紧张起来。

jushi.english: Don't fuss; we're sure to catch our train.
jushi.chinese: 别慌,我们一定会赶上火车的。

jushi.english: Now no use getting fussed,Fatty.Take it easy.
jushi.chinese: 好了,法蒂,现在紧张也没用了,放轻松些。
